pages.text: pheux hı khwam khunkhey kæ cha wkurech
pheux hı khwam khunkhey kæ phwk khea nı kar deinthangnı vdu hnaw (pi yemen) læa vdu rxn (pi cham)
dangnan cng hı phwk khea khearph phakdi phracea hæng ban hlang ni theid (khux xal kaxˌbahˌ)
phuthrng hı xahar kæ phwk khea hı phn cak khwam hiw læa thrng hı khwam plxdphay kæ phwk khea hı phn cak khwam hwad klaw
cea hen læw michı hrux phu thi ptiseth kar txbthæn (nı prlok)
nan k khux phu thi khab li dek kaphra
læa mi snabsnun nı kar hı xahar kæ phu khadsn
dangnan khwam hayna cng mi dæ brrda phu tha lahmad
phu thi phwk khea laley tx kar lahmad khxng phwk khea
phu thi phwk khea xoxwd kan
læa phwk khea hwnghæn kheruxng chı lek «nxy « (kæ pheuxnban)
thæcring rea di pra tha nxal kea sar kæ cea læw
dangnan cea cng lahmad pheux phracea khxng cea læa cng cheuxd satw phli
thæcring satru khxng cea nan khea pen phu thuk tadkhad
